title: Connected
synopsis: A collaboration of Mamoru Oshii, Koji Morimoto, and KENWOOD, Connected a promotional video for the KENWOOD wearable device with voice assistant "WS-A1" "WS-A1G." The short animation depicts future life with a unique interpretation and set in a fictitious city where devices have become commonplace. (Source: YouTube, edited)
